nodes.text: Gardulla was a beverage that was favored by members of the Hutt species during the reign of the New Republic. It was suggested to readers visiting any Huttese eateries in the spaceport of Mos Eisley on the planet Tatooine to try the drink, by the Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide, which was written in 6 ABY by the Human scholar Ebenn Q3 Baobab. He described the drink as mind-relaxing and listed it among his favorite Huttese food and drink in the Huttese language section of his guide. The beverage was also served in heavy pitchers at a huge feast held by Popara Anjiliac Diresto the Hutt at his penthouse on the planet Nal Hutta in 19 ABY.

Gardulla was first mentioned in the Galactic Phrase Book & Travel Guide, a 2001 book written by Ben Burtt. It later appeared in the novel Scourge, which was written by Jeff Grubb in 2012. The book was a novelized version of the Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game adventure Tempest Feud, although the beverage is not mentioned in the original RPG material. No sources have made a connection between the beverage and the Hutt Gardulla Besadii the Elder, with whom it shares a name.
